description: This file contains documentation and example code for methods within a Blits component, illustrating how to organize business logic and references in a LightningJS component.

classes.name: Carousel
classes.description: A Blits.Component representing a carousel with state, hooks, input handlers, and methods to fetch data.

methods.name: fetchData
methods.description: Asynchronous method that fetches data from an external API and updates the component's items state.
